tool_description:
Query millions of historical vehicle sales in all 50 states of the United States based on license plate number or VIN to obtain market value assessments of new and used vehicles. Data is updated monthly.
[View documents](https://rapidapi.com/dominonet-lTpEE6zONeS/api/vehicle-market-value/details)
name: Vehicle Market Value
title: Vehicle Market Value

api_list.name: Vehicle Market Value by License Plate
api_list.description: Vehicle Market Value by License Plate

optional_parameters.name: mileage
optional_parameters.description: The current mileage of the vehicle, or if not specified, the average mileage is used.For example: 50000

optional_parameters.name: period
optional_parameters.description: Number of days to look back for sales data ,maximum value: 365.For example: 180

api_list.name: Vehicle Market Value by VIN

optional_parameters.name: mileage
optional_parameters.description: The current mileage of the vehicle, or if not specified, the average mileage is used.For example: 50000

optional_parameters.name: period
optional_parameters.description: Number of days to look back for sales data ,maximum value: 365.For example: 180
